sentences.sentence: Their claims will be fervently denied.
sentences.translation: 他们的索赔将被严词拒绝。

sentences.sentence: In her excitement she had forgotten her evening prayer, so sitting up in bed, she prayed fervently to God.
sentences.translation: 由于激动，她忘记了她的晚祷，所以她在床上坐起来，虔诚地向上帝祈祷。

sentences.sentence: Plenty of Americans fervently hope they will be.
sentences.translation: 很多美国人热切地希望他们这样做。
